title: Just had a massive FPS drop as Elementalist Lux that cost me a game.
body:
GeForce GTX 1070
Intel Core i5 3570K
16 GB RAM
Game installed on Samsung SSD
Windows 10

I don't know if this is a bug or my own error, but I'd love to get some help either way.

I was playing Elementalist Lux in a multiplayer game today and at about 10 minutes my FPS went from a consistent 60 down to between 2-14. This did not stop throughout the game, and when I tried to get out of the Defeat screen, the game crashed. I know these FPS's because I had the GeForce recorder showing it to me. Otherwise, I tried to close every background app that was taking any sort of memory whatsoever. Nothing changed. I switched to very low graphics settings. This too, did not help. This has never happened to me before. 

Please help me. I would like to be able to play League, but I can't help my team if I'm playing at 2 FPS. Please help me fix this.

Edit:

To offer some context about my computer right now, I am currently running Dishonored 2 on Ultra settings at 60 FPS with multiple apps in the background. For this reason, I don't think a background app is limiting my performance.

replies.body: Is this FPS issue only happening when playing Elementalist Lux?

I've noticed this problem as well, and yes it appears to only happen when playing Elementalist Lux. I've played other champions with FPS fluctuating between 110-170, but with Elementalist Lux it will drop to between 30-70 and it gets kind of choppy.
Side note, it happens in any game with elementalist lux whether i'm playing her or not. Also had a few other people i've played with have the same issue.

Hmmm. It's possible there's an issue with the skin's assets inside your game folder. [Running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) should resolve this if this is the case.

Let me know if that helped.
For me i was in the loading screen and crashed. Then they had to remake and i got a leaverbuster and it said an error has occured. Is that similar?

I used to have this problem for the better part of Season 4 against Syndra wave ability graphics before upgrading my computer. It might be an issue with glow effects on certain processors. I never found a real fix for it, but a few updates and a new computer later, it was gone.

I've been having minor FPS drops with the new Elementalist skin as well. It seems to only be noticeable when I have my camera locked onto Lux, though. Then my frames drop. I've never had this issue before.
